bibl.title: Babingtons Hypereidesfragmente (Bb. I-VI).
bibl.note: Complément à: Teresa MORGAN, Some Lost Fragments of Hyperides, ZPE 123 (1998) pp. 75-77 et pl. II. - Concerns fragments of P. lit. Lond. 132 (= Pack2 1233) which have turned up in a collection in the library of St. John's College, Cambridge.
bibl.seg: Complément à: Teresa MORGAN, Some Lost Fragments of Hyperides, ZPE 123 (1998) pp. 75-77 et pl. II. - Concerns fragments of P. lit. Lond. 132 (= Pack2 1233) which have turned up in a collection in the library of St. John's College, Cambridge.
